main.name: Saheeli, Radiant Creator
main.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an Artificer or artifact spell, you get {E} (an energy counter).
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {E}{E}{E}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control, except it's a 5/5 artifact creature in addition to its other types and has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Avishkar's power comes from its joyful innovation, in the marvels that people can build when they work together for the common good.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"You think I sit in this seat because of luck? Because of providence? I hold this seat because I alone am fit to fill it."
—Gonti

card.name: Midnight Clock
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

card.name: Aether Hub
card.oracle_text:
When Aether Hub enters, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text: It powers the dreams of Ghirapur.

card.name: Arcane Denial
card.oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
card.flavor_text: Tools developed for infiltrating or sabotaging rival teams became new fields of research in their own right.

card.name: Chromatic Lantern
card.oracle_text:
Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text: The Omenpaths didn't just open portals to other worlds. It opened the eyes of many inventors who had been thinking too small.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

card.name: Explosive Vegetation
card.oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

card.name: Frontier Bivouac
card.oracle_text:
Frontier Bivouac enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.
card.flavor_text:
"The most powerful dreams visit those who shelter in a dragon's skull."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
card.flavor_text: The Consulate may be gone, but a savvy street artist still needs to evade disgruntled property owners.

card.name: Reckless Fireweaver
card.oracle_text: Whenever an artifact you control enters, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.
card.flavor_text: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text:
"Nissa asked if the light of foreign suns could affect the flora of Avishkar through Omenpaths. I built a device to capture such light for further testing."
—Rashmi, aether-seer

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When this creature dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Elder Gargaroth
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
Whenever Elder Gargaroth attacks or blocks, choose one —
• Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
• You gain 3 life.
• Draw a card.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Blasphemous Act
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
card.flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Commander's Sphere
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Loyal Apprentice
card.oracle_text:
Haste
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Retrofitter Foundry
card.oracle_text:
{3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry.
{2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
{T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Reality Shift
card.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)
card.flavor_text: Forget the expected. Embrace the unpredictable.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: As magnigoth trees expanded across the sea into Almaaz and New Argive, it became clear Yavimaya's borders were never confined by its coastline.

card.name: Karplusan Forest
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: Between jagged, snowcapped peaks, the dense bands of hardy evergreens provide the perfect cover for roving bands of orc and goblin raiders.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

card.name: Conjurer's Closet
card.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
card.flavor_text:
"Tomorrow wears yesterday's face."
—Kordel the Cryptic

card.name: Pia and Kiran Nalaar
card.oracle_text:
When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Thopter Spy Network
card.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Duplicant
card.oracle_text:
Imprint — When Duplicant enters, you may exile target nontoken creature.
As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

card.name: Whirler Rogue
card.oracle_text:
When Whirler Rogue enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Aethersquall Ancient
card.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
Pay eight {E}: Return all other creatures to their owners' hands. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Architect of the Untamed
card.oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Pay eight {E}: Create a 6/6 colorless Beast artifact creature token.
card.flavor_text: Next to her designs, life seems like a pale imitation.

card.name: Aetherworks Marvel
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a permanent you control is put into a graveyard, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}, Pay six {E}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Cultivator's Caravan
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Combustible Gearhulk
card.oracle_text:
First strike
When Combustible Gearhulk enters, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

card.name: Confiscation Coup
card.oracle_text: Choose target artifact or creature. You get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters), then you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that permanent's mana value. If you do, gain control of it.
card.flavor_text: "Citizens, do not resist. This is for your safety. Tezzeret bids you to surrender your inventions. Now."

card.name: Panharmonicon
card.oracle_text: If an artifact or creature entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
card.flavor_text: All who listen hear their own song, a unique melody played just for them.

card.name: Aethertide Whale
card.oracle_text:
Flying
When Aethertide Whale enters, you get six {E} (energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return Aethertide Whale to its owner's hand.
card.flavor_text:
"To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view."
—Kadhu, skywhaler

card.name: Aetherwind Basker
card.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Aetherwind Basker enters or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter) for each creature you control.
Pay {E}: Aetherwind Basker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

card.name: Disallow
card.oracle_text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
card.flavor_text:
"How easily your flames are quenched."
—Baral, Chief of Compliance

card.name: Lightning Runner
card.oracle_text:
Double strike, haste
Whenever Lightning Runner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay eight {E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
card.flavor_text: "Catch me if you can."

card.name: Peema Aether-Seer
card.oracle_text:
When Peema Aether-Seer enters, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
card.flavor_text: "The Great Conduit connects us all."

card.name: Rogue Refiner
card.oracle_text: When Rogue Refiner enters, draw a card and you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
card.flavor_text: "It's natural, it's all around us, and it's there for the taking. Just try and tell me what I'm doing is wrong."

card.name: Spire of Industry
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.
card.flavor_text: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

card.name: Academy Ruins
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
card.flavor_text:
"It's often said that an idea can never be killed. How I wish that were true."
—Saheeli Rai

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.oracle_text:
Rootbound Crag enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
card.flavor_text: Cliffs echo and branches quake at the roar of life.

card.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
−2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Talisman of Curiosity
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Talisman of Curiosity deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"The pain of exploring is less than the pain of not knowing."
—Tamiyo

card.name: Sheltered Thicket
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Sheltered Thicket enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Soul-Guide Lantern
card.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, exile target card from a graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile each opponent's graveyard.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Chain Reaction
card.oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
card.flavor_text:
"Look, I don't know what happened. And I really wish I did, so I could do it again!"
—Tailpipe, Rocketeer

card.name: Attune with Aether
card.oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
card.flavor_text: "I've never seen a world where aether weaves through every aspect of nature."

card.name: Decoction Module
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control enters, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{4}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
card.flavor_text: Progress leads to inspiration.

card.name: Era of Innovation
card.oracle_text:
Whenever an artifact or Artificer you control enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay six {E}, Sacrifice Era of Innovation: Draw three cards.

card.name: Glimmer of Genius
card.oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
card.flavor_text: Creators live for that moment of inspiration: precious, profound, perfect.

card.name: Servant of the Conduit
card.oracle_text:
When Servant of the Conduit enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text: "Creation without connection to nature is just manufacture."

card.name: Whirler Virtuoso
card.oracle_text:
When Whirler Virtuoso enters, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}{E}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
card.flavor_text: The first tentative flaps are like a song to his soul.

card.name: Hinterland Harbor
card.oracle_text:
Hinterland Harbor enters tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
card.flavor_text:
"Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that."
—Alene of Riverspan

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.oracle_text:
Sulfur Falls enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
card.flavor_text:
"We have inherited the mysteries of the Thran, but few of the answers."
—Jhoira

card.name: One with the Machine
card.oracle_text: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.
card.flavor_text:
"When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself, I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible."
—Tezzeret

card.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

card.name: Vineglimmer Snarl
card.oracle_text:
As Vineglimmer Snarl enters, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
card.flavor_text: A verdant paradox of primal logic.

card.name: Frostboil Snarl
card.oracle_text:
As Frostboil Snarl enters, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
card.flavor_text: A smoldering storm of chilling fire.

card.name: Triplicate Titan
card.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
When Triplicate Titan dies, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with flying, a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with vigilance, and a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with trample.

card.name: Slagwoods Bridge
card.oracle_text:
Slagwoods Bridge enters tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
card.flavor_text: The path to action is forged in confidence.

card.name: Tanglepool Bridge
card.oracle_text:
Tanglepool Bridge enters tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
card.flavor_text: The path to change is forged in insight.

card.name: Ornithopter of Paradise
card.oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text:
"Through even our darkest days, we must never cease creating. Each new invention brings value to the world, be it beauty, utility, or both."
—Rashmi, aether-seer

card.name: Treasure Vault
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifice Treasure Vault: Create X Treasure tokens.
card.flavor_text: There is wealth enough inside to cause the rise and the ruin of dynasties.

card.name: Druid of Purification
card.oracle_text: When Druid of Purification enters, starting with you, each player may choose an artifact or enchantment you don't control. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.
card.flavor_text: "Innovation was meant to end our wars, but it has only brought new conflicts. We must return to our roots."

card.name: Bootleggers' Stash
card.oracle_text: Lands you control have "{T}: Create a Treasure token."
card.flavor_text: Labyrinths of tunnels beneath the streets of the Caldaia offer an ample array of discreet routes for enterprising smugglers.

card.name: Overflowing Basin
card.flavor_text: Still to the ignorant eye, yet bursting with life. A million actions and reactions, unstoppable as the dawn.

card.name: Solar Transformer
card.oracle_text:
Solar Transformer enters tapped.
When Solar Transformer enters, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.

card.oracle_text:
{T}: You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}{E}: Tap target creature.
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Draw a card.
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Bespoke Battlewagon becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

card.oracle_text:
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay one or more {E}. If you do, create an X/X colorless Vehicle artifact token named Nalaar Aetherjet with flying and crew 2, where X is the amount of {E} spent this way.

card.name: Pia Nalaar, Chief Mechanic
card.oracle_text:
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay one or more {E}. If you do, create an X/X colorless Vehicle artifact token named Nalaar Aetherjet with flying and crew 2, where X is the amount of {E} spent this way.

card.oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
You may pay eight {E} rather than pay the mana cost for permanent spells you cast.
card.flavor_text: "Zendikar still seems so far off, but Chandra is my home."

card.name: Adaptive Omnitool
Aetheric Amplifier
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{4}, {T}: Choose one. Activate only as a sorcery.
• Double the number of each kind of counter on target permanent.
• Double the number of each kind of counter you have.

card.name: Stridehangar Automaton
card.oracle_text:
Thopters you control get +1/+1.
If one or more artifact tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus an additional 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying are created instead.
card.flavor_text:
"Avishkar greets the Multiverse with an open hand, but do not assume we are defenseless."
—Pia Nalaar

card.name: Aetherflux Conduit
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the amount of mana spent to cast that spell.
{T}, Pay fifty {E}: Draw seven cards. You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
card.flavor_text: As Kaladesh became Avishkar, aether finally started flowing freely to all.

Trample, ward {2}
At the beginning of your upkeep, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to this creature's power. Then you may pay one or more {E}. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.
